verses.verse: It was for freedom<WG1657> that Christ<WG5547> set<WG1659> us free;<WG1659> therefore<WG3767> keep standing<WG4739> firm<WG4739> and do not be subject<WG1758> again<WG3825> to a yoke<WG2218> of slavery.<WG1397>
Behold<WG2396> I, Paul,<WG3972> say<WG3004> to you that if<WG1437> you receive<WG4059> circumcision,<WG4059> Christ<WG5547> will be of no<WG3762> benefit<WG5623> to you.
And I testify<WG3143> again<WG3825> to every<WG3956> man<WG444> who receives<WG4059> circumcision,<WG4059> that he is under<WG3781> obligation<WG3781> to keep<WG4160> the whole<WG3650> Law.<WG3551>
You have been severed<WG2673> from Christ,<WG5547> you who<WG3748> are seeking to be justified<WG1344> by law;<WG3551> you have fallen<WG1601> from grace.<WG5485>
For we through the Spirit,<WG4151> by faith,<WG4102> are waiting<WG553> for the hope<WG1680> of righteousness.<WG1343>

For in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> neither<WG3777> circumcision<WG4061> nor<WG3777> uncircumcision<WG203> means<WG2480> anything,<WG5100> but faith<WG4102> working<WG1754> through<WG1223> love.<WG26>
You were running<WG5143> well;<WG2573> who<WG5101> hindered<WG1465> you from obeying<WG3982> the truth<WG225>?
This<WG3588> persuasion<WG3988> [did] not [come] from Him who calls<WG2564> you.
A little<WG3398> leaven<WG2219> leavens<WG2220> the whole<WG3650> lump<WG5445> [of dough.]

I have<WG3982> confidence<WG3982> in you in the Lord,<WG2962> that you will adopt<WG5426> no<WG3762> other<WG243> view;<WG5426> but the one who is disturbing<WG5015> you shall bear<WG941> his judgment,<WG2917> whoever<WG3748> <WG1437> he is.

But I, brethren,<WG80> if<WG1487> I still<WG2089> preach<WG2784> circumcision,<WG4061> why<WG5101> am I still<WG2089> persecuted<WG1377>? Then<WG686> the stumbling<WG4625> block<WG4625> of the cross<WG4716> has been abolished.<WG2673>
Would<WG3785> that those<WG3588> who are troubling<WG387> you would even<WG2532> mutilate<WG609> themselves.

For you were called<WG2564> to freedom,<WG1657> brethren;<WG80> only<WG3440> [do] not [turn] your freedom<WG1657> into an opportunity<WG874> for the flesh,<WG4561> but through<WG1223> love<WG26> serve<WG1398> one<WG240> another.<WG240>
For the whole<WG3956> Law<WG3551> is fulfilled<WG4137> in one<WG1520> word,<WG3056> in the [statement], "You shall love<WG25> your neighbor<WG4139> as yourself.<WG4572>"
But if<WG1487> you bite<WG1143> and devour<WG2719> one<WG240> another,<WG240> take<WG991> care<WG991> lest<WG3361> you be consumed<WG355> by one<WG240> another.<WG240>
But I say,<WG3004> walk<WG4043> by the Spirit,<WG4151> and you will not carry<WG5055> out the desire<WG1939> of the flesh.<WG4561>

For the flesh<WG4561> sets<WG1937> its desire<WG1937> against<WG2596> the Spirit,<WG4151> and the Spirit<WG4151> against<WG2596> the flesh;<WG4561> for these<WG3778> are in opposition<WG480> to one<WG240> another,<WG240> so<WG2443> that you may not do<WG4160> the things that you please.<WG2309>
But if<WG1487> you are led<WG71> by the Spirit,<WG4151> you are not under<WG5259> the Law.<WG3551>
Now<WG1161> the deeds<WG2041> of the flesh<WG4561> are evident,<WG5318> which<WG3748> are: immorality,<WG4202> impurity,<WG167> sensuality,<WG766>
idolatry,<WG1495> sorcery,<WG5331> enmities,<WG2189> strife,<WG2054> jealousy,<WG2205> outbursts<WG2372> of anger,<WG2372> disputes,<WG2052> dissensions,<WG1370> factions,<WG139>

envying,<WG5355> drunkenness,<WG3178> carousing,<WG2970> and things like<WG3664> these,<WG3778> of which<WG3739> I forewarn<WG4302> you just<WG2531> as I have forewarned<WG4275> you that those<WG3588> who practice<WG4238> such<WG5108> things<WG5108> shall not inherit<WG2816> the kingdom<WG932> of God.<WG2316>
But the fruit<WG2590> of the Spirit<WG4151> is love,<WG26> joy,<WG5479> peace,<WG1515> patience,<WG3115> kindness,<WG5544> goodness,<WG19> faithfulness,<WG4102>
gentleness,<WG4240> self-control; against<WG2596> such<WG5108> things<WG5108> there is no<WG3756> law.<WG3551>
Now<WG1161> those<WG3588> who belong to Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> have crucified<WG4717> the flesh<WG4561> with its passions<WG3804> and desires.<WG1939>
If<WG1487> we live<WG2198> by the Spirit,<WG4151> let us also<WG2532> walk<WG4748> by the Spirit.<WG4151>
Let us not become<WG1096> boastful,<WG2755> challenging<WG4292> one<WG240> another,<WG240> envying<WG5354> one<WG240> another.<WG240>
